title: Acupuncture Treatment in New York City, NY - Naturna
author: Erick
cleaned_text: Reboot, Recharge, Renew - Naturally New York City Acupuncture Treatments and Therapies Acupuncture is a form of traditional Chinese medicine that has been practiced for centuries. It works by activating the body's natural ability to heal itself. By stimulating acupuncture points throughout the body you can improve digestion, reduce stress, treat hormonal imbalance, help relieve chronic pain and so much more. It acts to balance and rebuild the body's life force or energy known
